name: circumvention
content:

the process of avoiding something, especially cleverly or illegally: The worst problems came from circumvention of the rules. The ban is open to easy circumvention. See
circumvent
More examplesFewer examplesAs an industry, we do not tolerate the circumvention of rules. Circumvention of wildlife safeguards has been common, while protection of wild animals has been the rare exception, conservationists say.The case against him alleges circumvention of the legal process.
